Tic Tac Toe

Challenge a friend to a classic game!

Game History
How to Play

• Players take turns placing X's and O's

• Get 3 in a row to win (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal)

• Use the history to go back to previous moves

• Click "New Game" to start over
